attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is the point of the 11+?
It doesn't test your knowledge, it gives you a new system to learn!
It should either ban it or make it relevant to your knowledge.
You do all this work in Primary School so you can do well in Secondary school, so shouldn't the 11+ actually test you on the work that you have been learning?
Take this example: a pupil is brilliant, but finds it hard to do the 11+, he fails and has to go to a school inadeqete for himself, whereas if it had been relevant he would have gone to a proper school! We must ban this silly test or at least make it relevant.
